text: Karolína Hrdličková (née Plíšková, born 21 March 1992 in Louny, Czech Republic) is a professional tennis player from Czech Republic. She is a former world no.1 player. Plíšková reached US Open finals in 2016 but lost to Angelique Kerber.US Open 2016: Aggressive style almost pays off for runner-up Karolina Pliskova Retrieved 12 August 2018 She is currently ranked no.9.Karolina Pliskova's profile at WTA Retrieved 12 August 2018 == Career statistics == === Grand Slam tournament performance timeline === Tournament 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 A Q1 Q1 1R 2R 3R 3R QF QF 0 / 6 13–6 French Open A Q2 1R 1R 2R 2R 1R SF 3R 0 / 7 9–7 Wimbledon Q1 A 1R 2R 2R 2R 2R 2R 4R 0 / 7 8–7 US Open Q1 Q1 Q2 1R 3R 1R F QF 0 / 5 12–5 Win–Loss 0–0 0–0 0–2 1–4 5–4 4–4 9–4 14–4 9–3 0 / 25 42–25 === Grand Slam tournament finals === ==== Singles: 1 (1 runner-up) ==== Result Year Championship Surface Opponent in final Score in final Runner-up 2016 US Open Hard Angelique Kerber 3–6, 6–4, 4–6 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Czech tennis players
